desc: This book constitutes the proceedings of the 19th International Workshop on Computer Algebra in Scientific Computing, CASC 2017, held in Beijing, China, in September 2017.

details.authors: Vladimir P. Gerdt, Wolfram Koepf, Werner M. Seiler, Evgenii V. Vorozhtsov

title: Computer Algebra in Scientific Computing: 19th International Workshop, CASC 2017, Beijing, China, September 18-22, 2017, Proceedings (Lecture Notes in Computer Science)
